name: Chicken Fight (koneil)
description:
Two chickens see each other across a plain. They starting running towards each other, dodging obstacles along the way.

Chicken Fight is a 2-player minigame rush. It uses 1 button controls, a Shift Key for each player. If a chicken fails an obstacle, the other chicken wins!

Chicken Fight was created during Train Jam 2017 by:

Kevin O'Neil (Twitter) - Programming

Michael Hoffmann (Twitter - vgnotes.com) - Music and Sound

Rachael Azcueta (Twitter) - Voxel Art

Emil Ramos (Twitter) - 2D Art
